TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SaveOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the behavior of the object context when the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges%28System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions%29> method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions AcceptAllChangesAfterSave = int32(1)

Docs.summary: After changes are saved, the M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True method is called, which resets change tracking in the T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions DetectChangesBeforeSave = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Before changes are saved, the M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True method is called to synchronize the property values of objects that are attached to the object context with data in the T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Changes are saved without the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges%2A> or the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.AcceptAllChangesAfterSave%2A> methods being called.
